doc.title: High Fire Danger!
doc.plot: The Town of Rogue Spirit's normally carefree citizens are facing impending peril - their only fire truck has developed a severe cough. The town's Fire Chief has nowhere to turn, and in desperation must resort to calling in Rudy the Mechanic (Don Hayes), a part-time auto mechanic, part-time model ship builder & repairman, and part-time glass blower. Rudy rides to attempt to save the day - on his unicycle - encountering some colorful local citizens on the way! Can he fix the truck before the town goes up in flames? Find out as you take this comedic adventure through the old west, and meet a lively cast of characters - including a wise Indian chief with sage advice, and a happy-go-lucky Indian maiden (Leya Greenburg) who seizes any chance for an adventure!
